amendment.description: To increase funding for the United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF) and other international organizations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 160 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 160 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S2930-2932; text: CR S2930) To increase funding for the United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF) and other international organizations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 160 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 160 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Leahy.
